data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Atlanta Electricals Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from September 29 2025 the equity shares of Atlanta Electricals Ltd (Scrip Code: 544527) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250926-53 dated September 26 2025.
